title: Coronavirus | Fox News
description: COVID-19, which is caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, can cause mild to severe symptoms or even death in patients. The illness, which spreads mainly though close contact with an infected person, including those who are asymptomatic, sickened and killed millions during a global pandemic.
